Feature.Name: Size
Feature.Text: Shifters are about the same size as humans. Your size is Medium.

SpeedFeature.Name: Speed
SpeedFeature.Text: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

VisionFeature.Name: Darkvision
VisionFeature.Text: Your lycanthropic heritage grants you the ability to see in dark conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You canâ€™t discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

ResourceFeature.Name: Shifting
ResourceFeature.Text: On your turn, you can shift as a bonus action. Shifting lasts for 1 minute or until you end it on your turn as a bonus action. While shifting, you gain temporary hit points equal to your level + your Constitution bonus (minimum of 1). You also gain a feature that depends on your shifter subrace, described below. You must finish a short or long rest before you can shift again.

LanguageProficiencyFeature.Name: Languages
LanguageProficiencyFeature.Text: You can speak, read, and write Common and Sylvan.

SubRaceFeature.Name: Subrace
SubRaceFeature.Text: Several subraces of shifter exist, each with its own animalistic features. Choose one of the options below.

Race.Name: Shifter
Race.Description: Shifters are descended from humans and lycanthropes. Although they cannot fully change to animal form, they can take on animalistic features by a process they call shifting. As a shifter, you have the following racial traits.
